name: 2D Carrot Repair Farm - FREE!
description:
This was an entry to Global Game Jam 2020 from Nanaimo BC's first GGJ event.

The game can be played solo, but is intended for two players. One player collects pipes and fires off repairs with the mouse, while the other moves Plummy around the screen using WASD and jumping with SPACE!

(There is no end screen. Once Plummy exits to the right, you've won!)
